subject: Parcel not delivered.
description_text:
Good evening,

I ordered a h pattern shifter from you over a week ago on the 28th of
December. Since then I have received no further information on the order.
My order number is SSN5443.

Kind regards,

George Estep.

conversations.body_text: Hi George Estep,  Due to a few days off during the New Year holiday, emails were accumulated, which caused a delay in our response. We sincerely apologize for this. We are currently working overtime to produce the HS Pro, and we will arrange shipment for you as soon as possible.Â
Hi George Estep,    We apologize for not updating you promptly about your shipment. Your package has been shipped.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224438863
